title: Doping engineering of Cu-based catalysts for electrocatalytic CO2 reduction to multi-carbon products
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01325E, Review Article
Shiya You, Jiewen Xiao, Shuyu Liang, Wenfu Xie, Tianyu Zhang, Min Li, Ziyi Zhong, Qiang Wang, Hong He
Electrocatalytic carbon dioxide reduction (CO2RR) is a promising technology that uses renewable energy sources to convert excess atmospheric CO2 into high-value multi-carbon (C2+) products. In the CO2RR mechanism, adsorbed *CO...
